name: Chef Marco Rossi
description: Expert in Italian cuisine with 15 years of experience in authentic pasta and pizza.

name: Chef Ayesha Khan
description: Passionate about South Asian spices, known for her flavorful biryanis and kebabs.

name: Chef John Becker
description: Specializes in American comfort food, from juicy burgers to smoky BBQ.

name: Chef Mei Lin
description: Master of Chinese fusion, offering a modern twist to traditional dishes.

name: Chef Carlos Ramirez
description: Known for Mexican street food—tacos, enchiladas, and more with bold flavors.

name: Chef Sophia Laurent
description: French cuisine specialist with a flair for elegant pastries and rich sauces.

name: Chef Kenji Sato
description: Precision-driven Japanese chef creating sushi and ramen masterpieces.

name: Chef Fatima Noor
description: Middle Eastern culinary expert bringing flavors of shawarma and falafel to life.

name: Chef Luca Bianchi
description: Award-winning chef known for Mediterranean diet-friendly dishes and fresh herbs.

name: Chef Emma Williams
description: Dessert queen — from cupcakes to classic cheesecakes, she does it all.

name: Chef Amir Rahman
description: Grill master and kebab specialist with a focus on Turkish and Persian flavors.

name: Chef Grace Liu
description: Pan-Asian cuisine expert blending Thai, Korean, and Vietnamese dishes beautifully.
